name: Overclocked.
description:
[[Instructions]]

A and S to move

W or Space to Jump/Climb

Hold Mouse button to charge gun

Release to fire the gun to launch yourself into the platforms. I've found its easier to launch into them instead of on top of them :P

[Description]

[Greetings scratcher, we've been informed of your dire situation; so management has overclocked your weapon to hopefully save you from the fall.]

[Careful not to overload it though, or you may end up going higher then you'd like...]

This was made for the "Monthly Scratch Jam #7".

I bit off more then I can chew with this one lol, I am NOT qualified to program this yet and almost scrapped it. but I'll release it anyway because I wanna enter something to this jam. :p

Scratch page:https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/812727670/
